Gotron: I think I'll be very happy here.

ThunderCracker: Hopefully you wil=
l be, Gotron. Hopefully you and all of us will be happy until the end of ti=
me.

Indeed, and amen, Alloran. I may not have done much with Gotron, but a=
t least he's in a happy place where he'll live on until the end of time. Mi=
nime, my friend. I miss you...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: All=
oran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, May 12, 2001=
 12:17 AM
  Subject: Come on the Peace Train!


  :::The Skyscorchers/Gigat=
ron/Vulois::: 

  ::As the ship takes off, my bots remember things.  Vulois=
 remembers Battera 
  and Cybershark, and tears come to his eyes when he re=
members Soundwave.  The 
  Skyscorchers have memories of Tranquility, Datas=
treak, HeraldAngel, and their 
  lost comrade Eagle Eye. Gigatron remembers=
 the blessed Child, and his first 
  friend, Lord Defection:: 
  Vulois: I =
christen this vessel the Peace Train! 
  ::They fly for a long time, but fi=
nally reach the planet Draziw.  They are 
  welcomed by an old bot and his =
mate, who had not lost her beauty in her old 
  age:: 
  Gigatron: King Blu=
estreak and Queen Andromeda i presume? 
  ::Andromeda smiles:: 
  Andromeda=
: Yes, you have reached our home. 
  Bluestreak: We had visions of your arr=
ival, and we welcome you with open 
  arms. Things haven't been the same ar=
ound here since our son Orion left. 
  ::And so the Keepers and Vulois fina=
lly acheived peace.  they lived out the 
  rest of their days on Draziw wit=
h Bluestreak and Andromeda:: 

  Well I've been happy lately 
  Thinkin' ab=
out the good things to come 
  And i beleive it could be 
  Something good =
has begun 
  For out on the edge of darkness 
  There lies a Peace Train 
 =
 Peace Train tame this country 
  And bring me home again- Cat Stevens 

  =
In loving memory of Minime_316, whose hopes and dreams made this possible. =
  
  Wherever he is, hopefully he is at peace. 
  Your use of Yahoo! Groups=
 is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
